title: Government revenue and spending in Greece 2024
summary: The statistic shows Government revenue and spending in Greece between 2014 and 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .

In 2018 , Government revenue in Greece amounted to round 88.06 million euros , whereas Government spending came to around 86.29 million euros.Post-crisis Greece Government revenue and spending in Greece have been steady at around the 700 million mark since around 2008 ; in no Year subsequent to this has the Italian Government 's revenue or income exceeded its spending .
This imbalance of the budget has led to a deficit .
gold: This statistic shows the government revenue and spending in Greece from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024.
In 2018 , the government revenue in Greece amounted to around 88.06 billion euros , while government spending came to around 86.29 billion euros .
